title: Neuralink Helps a Dad See His Kids Again — Brad’s Story

author: Insta360
description:
Finding joy in small moments. That's what Brad Smith is doing, with the help of Neuralink and Insta360 Link 2.

In this short documentary, meet, Brad Smith, an ALS patient who has not only regained the ability to communicate but also broken through physical limitations, rebuilding an emotional bridge with his family. Acting as a “second pair of eyes,” Link 2 enables him to freely see his loved ones, bringing a profound leap to his quality of life.

We're honored to be part of helping patients like Brad reconnect with loved ones in new and exciting ways, using the latest in AI and innovative technology. Think bold!

00:00 - What Would You Do?
00:36 - The Neuralink Solution
01:17 - Life at Home
04:20 - The Value of Movement
04:45 - Using Link 2 as a Periscope
07:40 - Life No Longer Static

#insta360 #insta360link2 #insta360camera #neuralink

title: Neuralink Helps a Dad See His Kids Again | Insta360
